attributes.action: install a safe pedestrian crossing in the village of Forsbrook, Staffordshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A pedestrian crossing is needed in the village of Forsbrook on Cheadle road, that suffers from speeding, heavy traffic on blind bends. The public and school children are expected to negotiate this road with no safety at all, taking there lives into there hands.
Staffordshire county council insist that some one must die before they will look at the situation and have withdrawn fucnding for a proposed crossing.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "install a safe pedestrian crossing in the village of Forsbrook, Staffordshire."
